```{r}
titanic <- read.csv("C:/Users/nicho/OneDrive - The Pennsylvania State University/Stat 400/Lectures/L10_titanic3.csv")

titanic$SexInd <- ifelse(titanic$Sex == "female", 1, 0 )

levels(as.factor(titanic$Survived))
levels(as.factor(titanic$SexInd))


model1 <- glm(as.factor(SexInd) ~ Age + as.factor(Survived) + Fare, family = binomial, data = titanic)
summary(model1)
```
